subSections.title: Compounds
Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|めい}}

# [[tea]], especially tea [[picked]] later in the [[season]]<ref name="DJR"/>

subSections.title: Synonyms
subSections.text: * {{ja-r|茶|ちゃ}} {{qualifier|especially tea picked earlier in the season}}

subSections.title: Derived terms
subSections.text:
{{der3|lang=ja|title=Terms derived from {{ja-r|茗|めい}}:
|{{ja-r|苦茗|くめい}}: [[bitter]] [[tea]]
|{{ja-r|新茗|しんめい}}: newly-sprouted leaves of tea, tea made from newly-sprouted leaves of tea
|{{ja-r|茗園|めいえん}}: [[tea]] [[plantation]]
|{{ja-r|茗醼|めいえん}}, {{ja-r|茗宴|めいえん}}: [[tea party]]
|{{ja-r|茗器|めいき}}: [[teaware]]
}}
